subtitle: A light summery casserole that's bursting with flavour.

method.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan. Add garlic and onion and fry for 2-3 min or until softened. Add chicken to pan and fry all over for 8-10 min or until golden brown.

Transfer garlic, onion and chicken to an ovenproof dish and scatter over the red and green pepper. Add tomatoes, wine and sugar to the dish with papaya, seasoning and olives and stir until well mixed.
Cover dish and cook in oven for 1 hour or until chicken is tender. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken and papaya casserole
